resources.string:
Installing this extension will unlock backgroundyoutube playback and also lets you to download videos from : 

	1. Youtube
	2. Facebook
	3. Instagram
	4. Tiktok
	5. Twitter
	6. Vimeo
	7. TopBuzz
	8. Daily Motion
After Uninstalling this extension you will lose some great feature like background youtube playback and cannot download audio or video files.
